text: Miru may refer to: *Miru (goddess), a death goddess in Polynesian mythology *Miru, Iran, a village in Bandar Abbas County, Hormozgan Province, Iran *Miru River, a river of Romania ==People with the given name== *Miru Kim (born 1981), American photographer *Miru Shiroma (born 1997), Japanese singer ==See also== *Milu (disambiguation)
title: Miru
